column5: Happy Easter to everyone.Great morning up here to start the day.Grouse are flying into yard while having coffee on my deck.Sun is bright and warm and I hear geese flying.Bit windy again but wife said we should go fishing.mhhh.First night with above zero.I have a cooler with dead minnows that are frozen so will see what that ice does in next few days with our pretty warm Temps in the 12c range.
Coffee n burning a cig n watching grouse doesn't get any better than that!
Hearing the geese and swans pretty nice to.Good signs of better things to come
I guess it's not good to start talking ice fishing next winter!!
